name: DownSyndromeTestsForTrisomy21ChromosomalAnomaly
title: Down Syndrome (Tests for Trisomy 21 Chromosomal Anomaly)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting a trisomy 21 chromosomal anomaly),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chromosome 21 trisomy),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
